name: Dark Fighting Warrior: Shadow
description:
Welcome to real Shadow fighting ninja: dark battle fight warrior. In this shadow jump game you will have a true heart touching story of a real battle warrior who fight against the darkness of the ninja fighting. This story begins when a battle fight happened between a dark heart dark warrior of ninja assassin games who tried to steal the dark powers from the temple. In the intense fight with the shadow fighter the dark powers of shadow escaped and took control of all the shadow fighting ninja. You have learned to control the shadow powers and become a resistance against the terror of ninja fighting.
Real motion capture and animations make the ultimate fighting styles for shadow fighting ninja and give him strength to punch and kick with full force to knock out the evil of street fighting games. Your shadow ninja has taken control over the darkness of the shadow and your aim is now to end all the evil warrior who are completely in the control of shadow and people have lost their hopes in them. Real martial arts has become to an end in the effect of this darkness and it is time to show the ultimate fighting skills to the world with smoothest ever fighting animations of samurai games.
